title: Ward Skin disappeared?
body:
Hey Rito,

I've always had the spooky white ghost ward skin since the hallowing it debuted in but, recently, its disappeared from my list of skins (I also have the _feeling_ that there should be another one, but for the life of me can't puzzle out what that was if that was indeed the case. 

Anyway, my ranked games as Headless Hecarim have been noticeably less spooky since its disappearance act. I was wondering if you had the time to look into this for me?

Best,
Falsey

replies.body: This has recently happened to me too :(

Hey Fabulous Falsey! 

Sorry to hear it's been less 3spooky5you. D: Your best bet here would be to contact our [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) team. They'll be able to take a look at your account and see what's going on with your content. :)
